title: Senior AI Engineer
description:
About the job

We are seeking a Senior AI Engineer to join our ML platform team. You will design and implement production-scale AI systems that serve millions of users.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in Machine Learning and AI development
- Strong proficiency in Python and experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Knowledge of MLOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes for containerized deployments
- Strong understanding of deep learning architectures
- Experience with data processing frameworks (Spark, Pandas)
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Natural Language Processing (NLP) or Computer Vision
- Familiarity with large language models (LLMs)
- Experience with distributed training and model optimization
- Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
- Experience with monitoring and observability tools
- Publications or contributions to open-source ML projects

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable ML models for production
- Optimize model performance and inference latency
- Collaborate with data scientists and engineers
- Implement MLOps best practices
- Mentor junior team members

title: Machine Learning Engineer - AI Platform
description:
About the job

DataTech Solutions is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to build and maintain our AI platform. Join our team of innovators working on cutting-edge AI solutions.

Required Skills:
- 3+ years of experience in ML engineering or related field
- Proficiency in Python and ML frameworks (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch)
- Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Knowledge of Git and version control
- Experience with cloud services (AWS preferred)
- Understanding of model deployment and serving
- Strong SQL skills and database knowledge
- Experience with data pipelines and ETL processes

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
- Knowledge of streaming data platforms (Kafka, Kinesis)
- Familiarity with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
- Experience with A/B testing and experimentation
- Knowledge of model monitoring and performance tracking
- Experience with serverless architectures
- Understanding of data privacy and security best practices

What You'll Do:
- Build and deploy ML models to production
- Create data pipelines for model training and inference
- Optimize model performance and scalability
- Implement monitoring and alerting systems
- Work with cross-functional teams on AI initiatives
- Document technical designs and processes
